        <script>
         var oThis;var oNext;
        $(function () {
            $("#NextSlideTitle").text($("#banners li:eq(1) .mark").text());
            setTimeout(bannerLoop, 4000);

            $(".link-prev").click(function() {
                bannerLoop('prev');
                return false;                
            });
            $(".link-next").click(function() {
                bannerLoop('next');
                return false;
            });
        });
        function bannerLoop(direction) {
            if (direction=='prev') {
                $("#banners li:last-child").css("margin-left","-526px").prependTo("#banners");                
                $("#banners li:first-child").animate({marginLeft:"0"},350);
            } else {
                $("#banners li:first-child").animate({marginLeft:"-526"},350,function() {
                    $("#banners li:first-child").appendTo("#banners").css("margin-left","0");
                });
            }
            $("#NextSlideTitle").text($("#banners li:eq(2) .mark").text());
            if (!direction) {
                setTimeout(bannerLoop, 4000);
            }
        }
        </script>
